text: Kelantan FA President are the under-21s team of Kelantan Football Association that competes in the Piala Presiden (English: President Cup). They have won the Cup 7 times, in 1985, 1995, 2005, 2011, 2013, 2015 and 2016 and ended being runners-up in 1988, 2003 and 2006–07. The team mainly consists of Under-21 players at the club, and some of the players also registered for the senior team. The under-21 team is coached by Mohd Hashim Mustapha. Kelantan FA Youth are the under-19s team of Kelantan Football Association that competes in the Piala Belia (English: Youth Cup). They have won the Cup 2 times in 2008 and 2014 and ended being runners-up in 2013. The under-19s is coached by Sazami Shafi'i. ==Development squads== ===Registered for the senior team=== (Under-21s) (Under-21s) (Under-21s) (Under-21s) (Under-21s) (Under-21s) ==Under-21s== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:70%;" ! colspan="11" style="background:; color:; text- align:center;"| Forwards |- | 7 | Muhammad Amirul Aiman Ismail | | ST | 2001 |- | 9 | Ismail Ibrahim | | ST | 2002 |- | 10 | Mohd Hakimullah Mohamadiah | | ST | 2002 |- | 19 | Mohd Hafizan Ghazali | | ST | 2001 |- | 20 | Muhamad Amiruddin Roszaimi | | ST | 2001 |} The Kelantan FA U19 team plays in the Piala Belia and a number of local cup competitions. ==Staff== * U21s Manager: Dato' Shaari Mat Hussain * U21s Assistant Manager: Mohd Ausri Husin * U21s Head Coach: Kamaruddin Mohammad * U21s Assistant Coach: Abdul Aziz Mustafa * U21s Fitness Coach: Ghazali Hussin * U21s Physiotherapist: Ahmad Faris Musa * U21s Goalkeeping Coach: Mohd Azam Othman * U21s Security Officer: Normizal Ismail * U21s Media Officer: Ab Ghainizan Ab Bakar * U21s Kitman: Shamsudin Deraman * U19s Manager: Tan Sri Dr. Zaliman Sauli * U19s Assistant Manager: Sanusi Osman * U19s Head Coach: Coach: Mohd Anizam Daud * U19s Assistant Coach: Mohd Sideek Samsudin * U19s Goalkeeping Coach: Mohd Halim Bin Napi * U19s Physiotherapist: Wan Mohd Aiman Wan Zain * U19s Media Officer: Fazuny Mohd Noor * U19s Kitman: Noor Azmi Mohd Noor ==Coach history== ===U21s=== * Anizan Daud (2010) * Zahasmi Ismail (2011) * Mohd Hashim Mustapha (2011–2012) * Mohd Sideek Shamsuddin (2012–2014) * Mohd Nafuzi Mohd Zain (2015) * Mohd Hashim Mustapha (2016–2017) * Zahasmi Ismail (2018-) * Kamaruddin Mohammad (2020) ===U19s=== * Tengku Hazman Raja Hassan (2013–2016) * Sazami Shafi'i (2016–2017) * Zahariman Ghazali (2018-) * Mohd Anizam Daud (2020) ==Notable former players== The following is a list of players who have played in the Kelantan FA youth team (U19–U21). Players who are currently playing at Kelantan FA, or for another club on loan from Kelantan FA, are highlighted in bold. * Mohd Farisham Ismail * Ramadhan Hamid * Khairul Fahmi Che Mat * Mohd Shahrizan Ismail * Ahmad Syihan Hazmi Mohamed * Nik Shahrul Azim Abdul Halim * Mohd Qayyum Marjoni Sabil * Mohd Daudsu Jamaluddin * Zairul Fitree Ishak * Mohamad Faris Shah Rosli * Faizol Nazlin Sayuti * Mohamad Azwan Aripin * Mohd Rozaimi Azwar * Muhd Shahrul Hakim Rahim * Mohd Badhri Mohd Radzi * Muhamad Fadhilah Mohd Pauzi * Fakhrul Zaman * Mohd Khairul Izuan Rosli * Danial Ashraf * Amir Zikri Pauzi * Nik Azli Nik Alias * Muhammad Syazwan Yusoff * Mohd Zafran Akramin Abdul Razak * Wan Zaharulnizam Zakaria * Tuan Muhamad Faim Tuan Zainal Abidin * Mohd Nasharizam Abd Rashid * Mohd Syafiq Abd Rahman * Mohamad Faiz Suhaimi * Mohd Zamri Ramli * Mohd Shakir Shaari * Rizal Fahmi Rosid * Muhd Izuan Salahuddin * Norhadi Ubaidillah * Mohamad Aris Zaidi * Mohd Nurul Azwan Roya * Ramzul Zahini Adnan * Mohd Nizad Ayub * Azlan Ismail * Khairan Eroza Razali * Wan Zaman Wan Mustapha * Zul Yusri Che Harun * Khairan Ezuan Razali * Nicholas Chan * Ahmad Ezrie Shafizie * Nik Ahmad Fadly Nik Leh * Halim Napi * Mohd Faiz Mohd Nasir * Afiq Saluddin ==Top scorers== ===U21s=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
